segment.target: You start seeking traces of Mush... Pre-fungal level {quantity, select, 0 {nul} other {{quantity}}}.
**{character}** primes the machine. In a fit of crashing and banging, the mechanics kick in, the cogs grind and the aromas fill the room. It smells like a warm morning on a terrace on Venus. Coffee!
**{character}** hits up the dispenser with a strange glow in their eyes.
**{character}** takes a pill.
You eat this pathetic morsel to pull the wool over their eyes, but it doesn't give you any energy...
**{character}** cooked a little something for later on.
This thing isn't as badly made as you thought... you can't seem to manage to dismantle it...
**{character}** has dismantled the **{target_equipment}**.
**{character}** and **{target_character}** killed the lights and then the strange noises started... A few minutes later, the lights went back on. They seemed in great spirits afterwards.
**{character}** has dropped a **{target_equipment}**.
**{character}** put something in the microwave.
:mush: **{character}** has removed a spore. It's truly repulsive. And the smell...
**{character}** wakes up calmly...
**{character}** has hidden a **{target_equipment}**.
**{character}** caught **{target_character}** with a big right hook... who then repainted the wall with their nose...
You have successfully hyperfrozen and repacked the food.
**{character}** is lying down... It's good to just stop and take a break. Destination : the land of dreams!
**{character}** entered the room.
**{character}** left the room.
**{character}** starts reading enthusiastically...
**{character}** starts reading enthusiastically...
**{character}** has discovered a hidden **{equipment}**.
You have found nothing.
You wash yourself slowly under the shower, enjoying this rare moment of serenity...
While washing you feel yourself burning, like the water is slowly killing you... What you wouldn't do to switch places with one of them...
You wash yourself painfully, wondering if dismantling the showers was a good idea...
While washing you feel yourself burning, like the water is slowly killing you... What you wouldn't do to switch places with one of them...
**{character}** has picked up the **{target_equipment}**.
What a relief, **{character}** has successfully created a crossbreed of the **{target_equipment}**. The little plant is doing great!

What a relief... oh wait... **{character}** has not succeeded in their attempt to crossbreed a **{target_equipment}**. The little plant didn't grow and eventually died... Something must have contaminated the procedure.

You take a moment to wonder about the ventilation in the room as you apply the pink MT brand fungosecticide to your dear plant. After all it was used as successful biological and chemical warfare agent, but hey, the future of humankind is at stake.
You water the plants lovingly.
write_success
Pscchhhht... And there we go, a little extra oxygen!
**{character}** has removed a fuel capsule from the tank.
**{character}** has inserted a *fuel capsule* into the tank.
Strange, **{character}** is busying around their **{target_equipment}** which is giving off smoke...
Your sabotage attempt failed... it's trickier than it seems.
**{character}** put out the fire!
You failed to extinguish the fire...
**{character}** comforts **{target_character}**, it'll be better tomorrow, just you wait and see...
**{character}** has healed {quantity} :hp: for **{target_character}**.
You have healed yourself and in doing so, have restored {quantity} :hp:.
**{character}** is surrounded by a glowing halo. Horrible iridescent blue tentacles run along their body. The light they emit is blinding. Their wounds are perfectly healed!
**{character}**'s attempt to repair the hull has succeeded. It was high time that somebody took care of that...
Your attempt failed.
:mush: Well... it's getting hot in here... **{character}** has set fire to the room...
**{character}** installed their little **Camera** with care.
**{character}** has removed the **Camera**. It couldn't have been of any further use.
**{character}** is trying to resolve the infernal kube.
You use your extractor on this wretched boil. The noise is somewhat terrifying as is the amount of blood... Hang on, what the hell is that?
You use your extractor on this wretched boil. The noise is somewhat terrifying as is the amount of blood... Fortunately there is no spore there to recover.

Everyone looks focused on the small screen. Blouzorg appears on the screen, he looks proud and you can't understand anything he says. But it doesn't matter! [...] You applaud when Blouzorg beats his mother-in-law [...]. Who would have thought that Blouzorg and his space dog could danse the jerk! [...] Will Blouzorg marry Blourka? [...] The lights go out. These alien series are really incredible...
:mush: **{character}** blows on **{target_character}** a strange cloud...
The operation seems to last forever, **{character}** suffers a septic shock...
**{character}** gagged **{target_character}**.
:mush: **{character}** approached **{target_character}** and appeared to slip something into their walkie-talkie...
A piece of tape here, a weld there... and to think that this is all it takes to have a state-of-the-art iTrackie®©. All that's left to do is install the updates.
**{character}** shots directly at **{target_character}**'s head which rolls on the ground.
Dammit - lost again, it's unreal - this bloody machine almost killed you to boot!
OH YEEAAHH. **{character}** has defeated Xatator, the boss on LEVEL 10!
:hunter: Yes! **{character}** hit a *Hunter*.
You missed your target.
**{character}** has just taken off.
**{character}**'s patrol ship has just landed.
:hunter: Nearly there! **{character}** hit a Hunter.
You missed your target.
The **{character}**'s attempt to repair the *{target_equipment}* was successful. Youhou! It's as good as new!
Your attempt failed.
